content: **sparrowplay** group here 1 a quick hat plain enough to please the average bloke but interesting enough to keep the knitter happy i created this for my farming uncle to keep his head warm on frosty mornings other sizes make it perfect for kids bubs and ladies too sizes head circumference 41-46-51-56-61 cm / 16-18-20-22-24 the pattern is three pages and approx 940kb it is arranged so you only need to print out one page if you want to work from paper **important notes about the pattern ** ** 1 ** the large adult size really is for a large adult most people will find the small adult just fine also if you knit with worsted weight yarn rather than dk then expect your hat to turn out larger than expected ** 2 ** if you are a beginner attempting this pattern - good on you but please remember it is not my job to teach you how to knit or read patterns over the internet you can post general knitting questions in some of the ravelry forums such as patterns 2 or techniques 3 you are also more likely to get fast help from someone online/in the same time zone **copyright statement** please respect my copyright and do not duplicate this pattern other than for personal use this is a free pattern do not steal this pattern by selling it for your own profit do not publish this pattern anywhere including the internet without my permission any items you make from it are your own creative work and you may dispose of them as you wish gifts fundraising charity knitting even cottage-selling i reserve the right to negotiate a different arrangement for any larger scale commercial enterprise by downloading this pattern you agree to these terms and conditions 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/sparrowplay 2 http //www ravelry com/discuss/patterns/topics 3 http //www ravelry com/discuss/techniques/topics
